text: The year 2012 was the 3rd year in the history of the Road Fighting Championship, an MMA promotion based in South Korea. 2012 started with Road FC 006: Final 4 and ended with Road FC 010: In Busan. == List of events == {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="margin:1.0em auto; font- size:80%;" !
